headline: Walmart Inc. (WMT): A Top Pick For The Best Retirement Portfolio
summary: We recently published the best retirement portfolio for a 65-year-old. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Walmart Inc. (NYSE:WMT) stands against other stocks in the best retirement portfolio. The American retirement system is feeling the strain, with challenges like shrinking fees, underfunded plans, and an aging population slowing down […]

headline: The Costco Effect has Walmart on edge
summary: The “Costco Effect” is having a domino-like impact on the world of retail, forcing giants to rethink strategies in the face of tariffs, supplier pressures, and skittish consumer loyalty.

raw.headline: The Costco Effect has Walmart on edge

headline: Walmart's eggless Easter, Old Navy's AI bet, and Target cuts bonuses: Retail news roundup
summary: Walmart (WMT) is skipping the eggs this Easter to cut costs. Target (TGT) will cut bonuses for salaried employees in response to weaker consumer spending and inflationary pressures. Just as consumers anticipated a break in egg prices, proposed port fees may make bananas the next price casualty. Meanwhile, McDonald’s (MCD) has claimed the title of the world’s most valuable restaurant brand, surpassing Starbucks (SBUX) for the first time in a decade.
